dc:title: On Pilgrimage - December 1978
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Delights in the bustling neighborhood and relishes the sun gilding nearby buildings and trees. Jottings of the comings and goings, gifts received for her birthday, and memories of her conversion and past friendships.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 594 1978-12-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
